Sir Maurice Sydney Lipworth QC (Hon) (amụrụ na 13 Mee 1931), bụ onye ọka iwu ndị Obodo South Afrika, onye ọchụnta ego, onye ọrụ ọhaneze na onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka.
A mụrụ Lipworth na Johannesburg, South Afirika, na afo 1931 ma gụọ akwụkwọ na King Edward VII School na Johannesburg.
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Hambro Life Assurance na Sir Mark Weinberg na Lord Joel Joffe na UK (nke a na-akpọ Allied Dunbar Assurance na Zurich Financial Services ugbu a) (1971–1988).
Site na afọ 1988 ruo na afọ 1993 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Monopolies and Mergers Commission na UK (nke bụzi Competition Commission)
O mechara bụrụ onye isi oche nke Zeneca plc (nke bụ AstraZeneca plc ugbu a) na osote onye isi oche nke National Westminster Bank plc
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Financial Reporting Council na onye guzobere Trustee nke International Accounting Standards Committee Foundation (ruo 2005).
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Philharmonia Orchestra Trust, yana inwe ọtụtụ ndị nduzi ndị ọzọ na nhọpụta ọrụ ebere metụtara nka.
Akpọrọ ya na London Bar, họpụtara QC (hc) (1993) na ọ bụ Bencher, Temple dị n'ime
Ọ bụ onye otu Chambers na One Essex Court
Enyere ya LL.D nsọpụrụ sitere na Mahamadum nke Witwatersrand na 2003.
